title: Creamy tomato tuna pasta bake - cheap and easy
ingredients: ['500g pasta, of your choice', '1 handful frozen peas', 'oil, as needed for cooking', '1 to 2 onions, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 to 2 handfuls vegetables of your choice, chopped', '1 to 2 tins tuna, drained', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 (400g) tin tomato soup', '50g grated cheese, of your choice']
